QuestData.Title: Softening the Blow
QuestData.Description: Our best bet for moving our forces quickly to Icecrown Glacier lies with the network of tunnels beneath the ancient iron dwarf city of Thor Modan.$B$BBrugar Stoneshear and his Explorers' League boys aren't going to be happy, but orders are orders.$B$BThe news might go over better if you brought him a cask of that moonshine sold by that trapper, Hugh Glass, down at Redwood Trading Post, southeast of here along the tree line.$B$BMan's not right in the head, but you won't find better moonshine out here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Brugar Stoneshear at the Westfall Brigade Encampment a cask of Howlin' Good Moonshine.
QuestData.RewardText: Let me get this straight -- a $r I don't know brings me a cask of the finest booze in this miserable forest. Ok, then, what are you after?
